text: Paul Valthaty, a former Indian Premier League (IPL) sensation, has been appointed as the head coach of the Seattle Thunderbolts in Minor League Cricket, a T20 tournament that serves as a developmental league for Major League Cricket. This marks Valthaty's transition to coaching after announcing his retirement from domestic cricket last year. The Minor League Cricket tournament is a stepping stone for players to eventually participate in Major League Cricket.
